subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Daniel Alfredsson and Antoine Vermette scored on Ottawa’s first two chances in the shootout and Martin Gerber stopped Boston’s first two shots to lift the visiting Senators to their 12th win in their first 13 games, 2-1 over the Bruins.
snippet: Daniel Alfredsson and Antoine Vermette scored on Ottawa’s first two chances in the shootout and Martin Gerber stopped Boston’s first two shots to lift the visiting Senators to their 12th win in their first 13 games, 2-1 over the Bruins.
